feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 a.m. ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers near noon. Rain beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
